name: Barfi
review: Shehryar and Murtaza share the love for high-quality software, the passion for building something people want and the ambition of always doing our best. 10/10 would recommend working with Manufactor team.

name: Qasim Salam (CEO of Remotebase)
review: Manufactor is a collection of world class talent, from front-end to back-end and full stack work - I've been nothing but pleased with their communication, imagiation, insight and delivery.

name: Talha (CTO of CreativeMorph)
review: The output of Manufactor is unline any other team we've worked with. Their speed, professionalism and familiarity with all things mobile helped turn CreativeMorph into the slick application it is known as today.
